comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called artland, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 49919699@N04
comment._content: The view is toward the south east over the centre of Levin - near the left edge of photo, halfway up, you can see St. John's Methodist Church (begun in 1936) and just to the right of it, the Weraroa Peace Gates (1923).  The church is still there as of 2010, but the Gates are now gone.  Those two landmarks are on the corner of Cambridge and Kent Streets.

comment.author: 32741315@N06
